const response = await client.search({
  index: 'my_index',
  body: {
    query: {
      nested: {
        path: 'obj1',
        query: {
          bool: {
            must: [
              {
                match: {
                  'obj1.name': 'blue'
                }
              },
              {
                range: {
                  'obj1.count': {
                    gt: 5
                  }
                }
              }
            ]
          }
        },
        score_mode: 'avg'
      }
    }
  }
})
console.log(response)
